data.title: Florida (FL) Business Broker » Horacio Gomez Beret
data.text:
Horacio has vast experience in owning and operating his own companies, buying and selling his own businesses and providing business sales services to independent buyers & sellers. He provides not only knowledge as a broker, but also his unique experience as a buyer and as a seller.

As someone who has sold his own businesses, he can relate to your worries as you go through the process of selling something so important to you. As a buyer, he also understands your doubts and excitement when you are looking to purchase an existing business. You can count on Horacio’s counsel during one of the most important decisions of your life.

As CEO of a manufacturing company and as an advisor to a Fortune 500 company, he knows ways to examine your business processes and find methods to optimize them to increase the value of your business. When you are selling your business, he will focus marketing to target the right buyers. When you want to purchase a business, he will discover any hidden problems or opportunities that will influence your decision.

You can be confidant that Horacio and Murphy Business are the best team to support, advise, and guide you in this important endeavor.

WORK EXPERIENCE:

• NAGUTOR LLC, Business Consulting, St. Petersburg, FL President & Owner

• Tintas Paraguayas S.A., Paraguay President & Owner

• Belcar S.A. Special Graphic Inks, Argentina Director & CEO

• Austral University Engineering Faculty, Director and Trainer of Lean Six Sigma Program

• FLHO Consulting Group CEO and Owner

• New Horizons Computer Learning Center, West Palm Beach, FL CEO & Owner
